AVT IS A PREMIER SMALL BUSINESS SYSTEMS INTEGRATOR

AVT's highly specialized engineering staff has included some of the simulation industry's top leaders since its inception. Our dedicated staff, with an average of more than 25 years of simulation experience, provides specialized solutions for customers who require on-the-spot solutions to complex problems.

AVT Simulation utilizes Rotary Wing Trainers such as the Apache Gunnery Trainer (AGT)® and the Targeted Fidelity Aircrew Trainer (TFAT) to train its crews in simulation prior to deployment.

RAR is a unique flight skill that is only used by a small number of military pilots and aircraft around the world. It is a critical and dangerous task that requires extreme precision from the pilots and boom operators.

AVT's production capability employs MRP, detailed scheduling, and planning, as well as a strong local supply base, to deliver quality products on time and on budget. Our ISO 9001:2015 processes ensure consistency while allowing us to tailor to the needs of our customers.

AVT can provide AR/VR/MR simulations to support all aspects of Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities, so that real-world feeling scenarios and training can be experienced anywhere and at any time with just a headset and controller using game-based tools such as Unity.

AVT's core capabilities include maintenance training for the armed forces using simulation. Using Augmented Reality to view an engine piece by piece to better understand how to operate and repair it is a critical capability for improved Maintenance Training.

AVT focuses on leveraging legacy systems and utilizing cutting-edge gaming technology to provide high-fidelity custom databases at an affordable price. We have experience developing terrain databases for flight, ground, and maritime training environments.
